title: testforblock指令怎么检查NBT标签
author: tianqi482
txt_content:
本帖最后由 tianqi482 于 2020-5-2 21:12 编辑 

比如……检测一个坐标是100 10 100的有如下指令的循环式命令方块。scoreboard players tag @a add explode2 {Inventory:[{Slot:103b,id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",tag:{Tags:["explode"]}}]}。
版本是1.12.2。

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
tianqi482 发表于 2020-5-2 21:39
这是什么意思
删去就好了，复制多了

/testforblock x y z minecraft:command_block -1 {conditionMet:0b,Command:"scoreboard players tag @a add explode2 {Inventory:[{Slot:103b,id:\"minecraft:diamond_helmet\",tag:{Tags:[\"explode\"]}}]}",id:"minecraft:command_block"}

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: /testforblock x y z minecraft:command_block -1 {conditionMet:0b,Command:"scoreboard players tag @a add explode2 {Inventory:[{Slot:103b,id:\"minecraft:diamond_helmet\",tag:{Tags:[\"explode\"]}}]}",x:-299,y:8,z:-106,id:"minecraft:command_block"}

replies.author: tianqi482
replies.txt_content:
